name: Maze (itch) (Fangobango)
description:
Description:

Maze is a physics based puzzle & speed running game made for ScoreSpace Jam #22

Controls: 

  • A/Left Arrow -> Rotate left/Menu navigate left
  • D/Right Arrow -> Rotate right/Menu navigate right
  • S/Down Arrow -> Menu navigate down
  • W/Up Arrow -> Menu navigate up
  • Enter -> Menu select
  • Esc -> Menu navigate back

Notes:

  • Make sure you have hardware acceleration on if playing in the browser
  • Linux build has not been tested!

Credits:

Dante (Developer)

Kevin (Developer)

Kennr (Sound Design)

Froggy (Art) - twitch.tv/froggy
